column4: is there a way to make a live cd/install ubuntu off a USB drive?
sorry, the later it gets, the dumber i am. do you want to actually install from a USB drive, or do you want to use  a LiVe CD and have your settings stick
I keep getting I/O read errors from the liveCD, so I'm blaming the CD drive. Im trying to bypass it by going the USB way
I downloaded the image 3 times, and burnt ~5 cds... ARGH!
